name: schnell
description:
Schnell is a free arcade-style platformer, in which you are constantly chased by time. You have a timer of 5 seconds, and if it runs out, it's game over. To reset the timer the player must collect coins (which also grant him score). 

  • You have 5 seconds to reach the coin
  • The faster you reach it the more score you get
  • For every 2 coins you collect the level will change once
  • If you run out of time, fall of the map or get hit you die

Plans for the future:

  • Get the game on mobile stores
  • Add hats
  • Some form of multiplayer
  • More events
